extendedInfo.description: Celebrate Christmas, New Year and winter season holidays with this beautiful, fully customizable snowfall live wallpaper.Enjoy the gently falling snow over the background of your choice, and watch the FREEZING OF YOUR SCREEN. This is the first live wallpaper to have this unique window freezing effect! Swipe or touch the screen to clear the frost, draw shapes and see the wallpaper and snowfall behind it. It is like looking through the frozen window at the beautiful landscapes from the comfort of your warm home. :-) Now, you can have this feeling right in your pocket and at your fingertips with you all the time! :-) This wallpaper is completely customizable!In this Winter Live Wallpaper (aka Winter Wonderland FREE) you get 3 in 1 live wallpapers:â Christmas Live Wallpaperâ New Year Live Wallpaperâ Winter Live WallpaperBe unique and creative! Create your own customized live wallpaper!!!For troubleshooting please read IMPORTANT NOTES and FAQ at the bottom of the pageâ It is FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE:â Wallpaper settings:- Choose from 6 included HIGH definition wallpapers â two in every category- Choose from 60+ included LOW definition wallpapers â these wallpapers are for preview purposes only (all wallpapers in high definition are available in full version)- All wallpapers are sorted in 3 categories (Christmas, winter and New Year)â FREEZING WINDOW EFFECT:- Enable or disable freezing of the window- Select a freezing interval- Freeze now button for instantly freezing the screen- Select the freezing strength - Select the size of area to defrost with your touch (you can use this to draw shapes over the window like you do it at your home) :-)â Snow settings:- Snow Density - Snowfall speed- Wind speed affecting the falling snowflakes - Flake size- You can force all flakes to be the same sizeâ Christmas tree settings:- Show or hide the tree/s- Number of trees showing on screen (up to 5)- Three different tree types or random picking- Tree Size- Position/s of tree/sâ Additional options:- Share button for sharing the app with your friends- Move to SD card option *(please read the notes for important information on this option)PERMISSIONS: INTERNET and ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE are used for displaying non-intrusive ads on settings screen, and nothing else.TO USE: Home->Press Menu->Wallpapers->Live Wallpapersâ If you like the application, PLEASE RATE IT :-)â Also, if you enjoy it, please visit the sponsors sometimes (in the settings screen) or buy the full version to support the development of the app.â IMPORTANT NOTES and FAQ:- Move to SD card option:Due to Android operating system restrictions, if you install the application on SD card, after you restart the phone or connect it to the computer in mass storage mode, live wallpaper will be replaced by your phone's default wallpaper. After the phone is restarted or SD card remounted (or phone disconnected from the computer), you have to pick the live wallpaper again and disable and enable the freezing option (to reschedule freezing intervals).- Big size of the application:The big size of the application is because it contains HIGH definition HIGH quality uncompressed wallpapers. Please donât complain on the size, because lower size would demand compressing the wallpapers, and therefore lower quality of the wallpapers for your enjoyment.- Installation stops in the middle:It is caused by low memory on the phone. In Android operating system, it is not allowed to install live wallpapers directly to the SD card. Please free some memory and try again. After the installation on the phone memory, you can transfer the app to the SD card.- After updating strange artifacts appear on screenBecause of many code and settings changes, after updating, please enter the settings menu and press the default settings button to reset all settings to default. That will get things back to work fine.

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: This is just amazing. Could be sitting there for hours just to watch the snow falling :)
reviews.author: Elea Gradenwitz de Ontiveros

reviews.title: No HD images on free version
reviews.comment: All images are standard definition. Actually worse than standard def unless you upgrade.
reviews.author: timothy greggo

reviews.title: Looks great, doesn\'t work properly on Xperia S
reviews.comment: I love all the features and the level of customisation for this app.  Sadly, enabling either the christmas tree or the frosting feature immediately crashes the app on my Xperia S so I\'m forced to uninstall.
reviews.author: James Field

reviews.comment: Beautiful, but has minor display issues on devices with soft buttons? Snowflakes now \"vanish\" suddenly at bottom of screen.\tGoogle, I am Pronatalist, not \"A Google User.\" Why does Google never fix this issue that their all-must-use-broken-Google+-shoving has caused? I had previously complained of screen flicker on my Nexus 7, and app developer has been working to fix it. Still the picture doesn\'t quite fill to the bottom of the screen. LWP Stopped.Again-worked. The older version looked fine when I tried it on my Samsung 4.2-Inch Galaxy Player. I love the huge, random sized snow flakes, set to low density, slowest snow fall speed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What, how disapointing
reviews.comment: Only one semi-high quality picture. The rest is poor and useless quality. And the animated snowflakes looks cheap and fake. Uninstalling rightaway!
reviews.author: Noelle Thierry
